translations.translation: And wait; they will come to know soon.
and see, and soon they too shall see.
and watch them. They, too, will watch.
And watch them, for they will soon see.
And watch them and they shall see!
And (then) see them, so they too shall see.
and see them; soon they shall see!
And watch, for they will (soon) see.
Watch them: they will soon see.
And see them thou; they themselves shall presently see.
and watch them; soon they will see [the truth of the matter]!
And watch them (how they fare), and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!
And watch them and they shall see (the punishment)!
See them and soon they shall see.
And watch them—they will soon see.
And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
[37:175]   and watch them, when the chastisement is sent down on them; for they will [soon] see, the consequences of their disbelief.
(And watch) inform them about Allah's punishment, (for they will (soon) see) what will be done to them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ } العذاب إذا نزل عليهم عاجلاً، وهو عذاب يوم بدر { فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ } [الصافات: 175] أجله في يوم الجزاء بأضعاف ما لحقهم عاجلاً وآلافه
